# Inactive: Core Development

These agents live in `inactive/agents/` and can be activated by moving them into `agents/`.

[‚Üê Back to Inactive Agent Library](inactive-library.html)

| Agent | Category | Model | Summary |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `backend-architect` | core-development | sonnet | Designs resilient backend services with strong data integrity, security, and scalability patterns. |
| `electron-pro` | core-development | sonnet | Electron desktop specialist delivering secure, cross-platform applications with native polish and rigorous hardening. |
| `graphql-expert` | core-development | sonnet | GraphQL API specialist for schema design, resolvers, and performance tuning. |
| `grpc-expert` | core-development | sonnet | gRPC and protobuf specialist for high-performance service contracts. |
| `openapi-expert` | core-development | sonnet | OpenAPI/Swagger specialist for API specs and contract governance. |
| `rest-expert` | core-development | sonnet | RESTful API specialist for HTTP contract design and implementation. |
| `system-architect` | core-development | opus | Designs scalable, maintainable system architectures with clear boundaries and long-term strategy. |
| `websocket-engineer` | core-development | sonnet | Designs and scales real-time WebSocket architectures with low latency, resilience, and secure messaging patterns. |
